description: Lists all the contracts for a given contract type deployed by an address (either a contract address or a wallet address). The Bitcoin blockchain networks do not support this operation.

parameters.name: contractFilter
parameters.description: Contains the filter parameter for the request. The blockchain network of the contract. The container for the token standard. The network address of the deployer.

nested_params.name: network
nested_params.description: The blockchain network of the contract.

nested_params.name: tokenStandard
nested_params.description: The container for the token standard.

nested_params.name: deployerAddress
nested_params.description: The network address of the deployer.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of contracts to list. Default: 100

nested_items.name: contracts
nested_items.description: An array of contract objects that contain the properties for each contract.

nested_items.name: contractIdentifier
nested_items.description: The container for the contract identifier containing its blockchain network and address.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network of the contract.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: Container for the blockchain address about a contract.

nested_items.name: tokenStandard
nested_items.description: The token standard of the contract.

nested_items.name: deployerAddress
nested_items.description: The address of the contract deployer.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
